briefTitle: Long-term Study of Teduglutide in Pediatric Subjects With Short Bowel Syndrome Who Completed the TED-C13-003 Study
officialTitle: A Retrospective and Prospective, Open-label, Long-term Safety and Efficacy Study of Teduglutide in Pediatric Subjects With Short Bowel Syndrome Who Completed TED-C13-003
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of teduglutide treatment of children with short bowel syndrome (SBS) who completed the TED-C13-003 study over a long-term period. It will evaluate how these children fared after the TED-C13-003 study ended. This study will also offer teduglutide treatment to eligible subjects, regardless of treatment received in TED-C13-003.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Adverse Events (AEs) in Retrospective Observation Period
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From end of the core study (TED-C13-003 [NCT01952080]) up to the beginning of the prospective period (up to Week 168)
